title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags

- Easy to use: Each bag has a bright red drawstring you can pull to close the bag quickly and carry it without spills.
- Strong and reliable: “Flextra” strength plastic helps prevent rips and tears, even with heavy or pointy trash.
- Just the right size: Fits most standard tall kitchen cans (13-gallon size).
- Gentle on the senses: Unscented, so there’s no added smell.
- Clean look: White bags keep messes out of sight.
- Good value: 50 bags in every box.

Helpful tip: If you use Alexa, you can say, “Alexa, reorder my Amazon Basics Flextra trash bags,” and get more when you’re running low.

Simple steps:
1) Place the bag in your kitchen trash can.
2) When full, pull the red strings, tie a knot, and lift out.
3) Take it to your outside bin.

These bags are made to be easy, strong, and hassle-free, so taking out the trash is simple every time.
